titles.title: Event Waveforms of the March 2019 Induced Earthquake Swarm near Red Deer, Alberta

descriptions.description: Here are the detected event waveforms of the March 2019 induced earthquake swarm near Red Deer, Alberta, which were recorded at a semi-permanent broadband station (RDR) of CRANE network (Gu et al., 2011) and collected from our temporary nodal array (deployed from 20 March 2019 to 10 April 2019). The data set only contains raw seismograms without response removal, downsampling, or filtering. Continuous data and instrument response files are available upon request. For any questions, please contact Jingchuan Wang (jingchuan@ualberta.ca).
2019_Nodal_waveforms.zip: event waveforms from the nodal geophone array (March 20 - April 10, 2019);
2019_CRANE_RDR_waveforms.zip: event waveforms from the RDR station (March 4-19, 2019);
Catalog_total.txt: the earthquake catalog from this study
